nodes.name: Leadership Team
nodes.role: Sätter riktningen och säkrar att hela verksamheten arbetar mot samma mål.
responsibilities: Tilldela resurser mellan regioner och supportorganisation

nodes.name: COO
nodes.role: Driver den globala driften och utvecklar regionernas kapacitet.

nodes.name: Support Office Global
nodes.role: Sätter globala standarder och ger expertis till regionerna.

nodes.name: Marketing & Sales Global
nodes.role: Drive guest flow and campaigns to maximize park utilization and revenue.

inputs.desc: Support with marketing systems and analytics platforms

responsibilities: Develop and maintain global marketing & sales framework
Create compelling campaigns that drive guest acquisition and retention
Ensure consistent brand messaging across all markets
Optimize pricing strategies to maximize revenue
Analyze market trends and competitive landscape
Support regional teams with marketing expertise and resources
activities: Coordinating global marketing initiatives and campaigns
Developing brand guidelines and marketing materials
Managing digital marketing platforms and social media presence
Conducting market research and competitive analysis
Training regional teams on marketing best practices
Collaborating with operations on capacity planning
outcomes: Global marketing guidelines and brand standards
Effective marketing campaigns that drive guest traffic
Optimized pricing strategies across all markets
Increased brand awareness and guest acquisition
Improved revenue per guest and overall profitability

nodes.name: Expansion Global

outputs.desc: Expansion projects and new park development
Expansion projects and new park development
Expansion projects and new park development

Identify and evaluate new market opportunities and locations
Plan and design new park concepts and attractions
Manage expansion projects from concept to opening
Ensure new parks meet brand standards and operational requirements
Support regional teams with expansion expertise and resources
activities: Coordinating global expansion initiatives and market analysis
Conducting market research and feasibility studies
Developing new park concepts and attraction designs
Managing expansion project timelines and budgets
Collaborating with architects, contractors, and vendors
Training regional teams on new park operations
Supporting grand opening events and marketing campaigns
outcomes: Global expansion guidelines and strategic framework
Successful new park openings and market entries
Innovative park concepts and attraction designs
Strong market presence and brand expansion
Profitable new locations and revenue growth
Scalable expansion processes and best practices

Provide accurate financial reporting and analysis
Support budget planning and forecasting processes
Ensure compliance with financial regulations and standards
Optimize cash flow and working capital management
Support investment decisions and capital allocation

Preparing consolidated financial statements and reports
Conducting financial analysis and performance monitoring
Managing treasury operations and cash flow
Supporting regional teams with financial expertise
Ensuring compliance with accounting standards and regulations
Collaborating with operations on cost optimization
outcomes: Global financial guidelines and reporting standards
Accurate and timely financial reporting across all regions
Effective budget planning and resource allocation
Compliance with financial regulations and standards
Strong financial controls and risk management

nodes.name: IT Global
nodes.role: Own and manage systems and digital infrastructure to support business operations.

inputs.desc: Marketing system requirements and analytics needs

responsibilities: Develop and maintain global IT framework and standards
Ensure reliable and secure IT infrastructure across all regions
Support digital transformation and innovation initiatives
Maintain data security and compliance with regulations
Provide technical support and training to regional teams
Manage IT vendors and service providers
activities: Coordinating global IT initiatives and system implementations
Managing IT infrastructure and cloud services
Supporting regional teams with technical expertise
Managing IT budgets and vendor relationships
outcomes: Global IT guidelines and technical standards
Reliable and secure IT infrastructure across all regions
Trained regional IT teams and technical support
Compliance with data security and privacy regulations
Optimized IT costs and vendor relationships

nodes.name: HR & Training Global
nodes.role: Ensure competence through comprehensive training and development programs.

inputs.desc: Operational training needs and best practices

responsibilities: Develop and maintain global HR & training framework
Ensure all staff receive proper safety and operational training
Create standardized training programs across all regions
Support talent acquisition and retention strategies
Maintain compliance with local labor laws and regulations
Develop leadership and management training programs
activities: Coordinating global training initiatives and programs
Developing training materials and e-learning platforms
Conducting train-the-trainer sessions for regional teams
Managing performance evaluation and development processes
Collaborating with safety and operations on specialized training
outcomes: Global training guidelines and standardized programs
Well-trained staff across all regions and functions
Trained regional HR and training teams
Compliance with safety and operational standards

nodes.name: Safety Global
nodes.role: 24/7 guest safety above and beyond what could be expected

inputs.desc: Support with training of local organization
Support with systems (e.g., self-check, document handling)
Support with safety work implementation (e.g., preventive and corrective maintenance)
Support with follow-up and execution of some activities from regional managers in operations

responsibilities: Ensuring operations follow all applicable guest safety standards
Being one step safer than required standards
Continuously improving safety through structured analysis and quick implementation
Training operations in safety 'ways of working'
Controlling operations to follow safety 'ways of working'
Ensuring safety work 'never miss a beat'
Documenting and following up on all activities in the safety area
activities: Upholding and updating the safety 'ways of working' framework (including risk analysis, safety information, guest supervision, maintenance, injury analysis, injury management)
Training operations in safety 'ways of working'
Controlling operations in safety 'ways of working'
Managing the overall safety annual plan and execution (inspections, analysis, reviews)
Documenting and following up on actions in the safety area
Handling interactions with suppliers and local bodies
Handling interactions with seriously injured guests
Handling interactions with standards bodies and consumer agencies
outcomes: Providing easy-to-understand and follow 'ways of working' for the local organization
Serving as a center of excellence for training and coaching in safety 'ways of working'
Securing safety by being a 'pain in the ass' for the local organization to ensure 'never miss a beat'
Securing safety by ensuring certification and inspection
Providing input to activity and operational design to minimize injuries in existing and new parks (including redesign), driving change projects
Providing structured analysis and business intelligence in the safety area (e.g., KPIs)
Managing all external communication in the safety area (e.g., bad press, CA's, suppliers)

Managing preventive and corrective maintenance programs
Training regional teams on maintenance procedures
Managing maintenance budgets and vendor relationships
Conducting equipment inspections and safety audits
outcomes: Global maintenance guidelines and standardized procedures
Well-maintained attractions and facilities across all regions
Optimized maintenance schedules and reduced downtime
Compliance with safety and operational standards
Reliable equipment performance and guest satisfaction
